about_the_game:
Freeland is a virtual universe waiting to be explored, conquered, and shaped by your choices in this VR role-playing adventure. Immerse yourself in a colossal galactic online adventure where expansive open worlds teem with endless possibilities. Engage in quests that will challenge and reward you as you traverse this ever-evolving virtual universe. Unveil the rich storyline and forge your identity while connecting with players from across the globe through unparalleled social experiences.



The galaxy is on the brink of destruction, and Ventax, the rogue all-powerful architect, threatens the very fabric of existence. Your mission is clear: to travel across multiple planets, forge alliances, and bring peace to the people of Freeland.



●Create your unique virtual identity.

●Forge alliances and make friends as you meet other players in the online universe.

●Explore diverse open-world planets and become immersed in the virtual galaxy.

●Find or craft gear and upgrade your skills, with magic and weaponry.

●Engage in immersive quests and help save the Freeland Galaxy from Ventax.

●Travel freely between planets with your spaceship.

●Fight in epic battles against Ventax’s armies spread across the planets.

●Race to the top of the leaderboards with cars, spaceships, jet skis, mounts and parkour races.

●Challenge other players in arena battles.



Enter the Freeland universe and join the epic adventure! Are you ready for the future of VR Gaming? Dive into Freeland now!

name: Freeland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Valve Index, Oculus Rift/S, Meta Quest 2/3, HTC Vive/Pro, Pimax and other Mixed Reality headsets
  • Additional Notes: Full finger tracking for Valve Index controllers supported

short_description: Freeland is a huge multi-planetary VR galactic online adventure game. The galaxy is in peril as the Dark Lord Ventax spreads corruption. Traverse worlds, free the Valiants, and restore peace. Join forces with friends, embark on quests, and race friends in the largest-scale VR adventure ever created.
